titleStmt.title: A treatise vpon John 8. 36 concerning Christian libertie The chiefe points whereof were deliuered in a sermon preached at Pauls Crosse, Nouemb. 6. 1608. By George Dovvname Doctor of Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Downame, George, d. 1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Matthew Lownes, and William Welby,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The doctrine of Christian libertie.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
